document.full_text: u.s.-based chevron corp  said on friday it had launched an inquiry into an explosion at its oil refinery in southwest wales which killed four people and seriously injured one.
document.title: chevron launches inquiry into uk refinery blast
lines_and_colors: u.s.-based chevron corp  said on friday it had launched an inquiry into an explosion at its oil refinery in southwest wales which killed four people and seriously injured one.
